entry.title: European Blockchain Convention 2024: Industry Experts Discuss What‚Äôs Next For Crypto Adoption, Blockchain Tech And Web3
entry.summary:
The European Blockchain Convention (EBC) took over Barcelona for its 10th edition. The two-day event featured a line-up of speakers that fostered exciting dialogues between the industry experts.
The Catalan capital saw some of the crypto industry‚Äôs brightest minds discuss digital assets, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), tokenization, Web3, and sustainability, exploring the industry‚Äôs future amid the growing adoption and evolving regulatory framework worldwide.
Day 1: ‚ÄúCrypto Adoption Can‚Äôt Be Forced‚Äù
On September 25, EBC10 kickstarted its ‚Äúbiggest edition yet‚Äù with Daniel Salmeron and Victoria Gago, two of EBC‚Äôs founders, discussing why the world needs crypto. The day was followed by a debate between Alireza Siadat (Annerton), Yael Ossowski (Consumer Choice Center), and Vugar Adigozal‚Ä¶

entry.title: Canada's Crypto Firms Get More Time to Comply with Stablecoin Rules
entry.summary: The Canadian Securities Administrators (CSA) updated stablecoin regulations for crypto asset trading platforms. The CSA has also extended the compliance deadline for registered firms to meet new conditions or propose alternatives to protect investors. CSA Extends Stablecoin Compliance Deadline Despite global efforts to develop payment-based and banking-based regulatory frameworks for stablecoins, Canada lacks a structured regulatory regime for the asset class. However, the CSA expressed its commitment to protecting Canadian investors from the risks posed by trading these assets. The administrators have now extended its previous deadline of October 31, 2024, to December 31, 2024, reportedly due to technical challenges faced by CTPs. This gives the platforms additional time to e‚Ä¶

Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency asset has captured the attention of crypto enthusiasts as the coin is demonstrating bullish momentum to hit the $66,000 level. Despite this newfound upward strength, whale investors have resumed shorting BTC, triggering worries about a possible decline in price.

entry.title: CryptoQuant CEO Senses ‚ÄòBullish Vibes‚Äô as CZ‚Äôs Early Release Raises Market Hopes
entry.summary:
The anticipation surrounding the potential release of Binance founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) from prison later today has been stirring conversations in the crypto space. So far, CZ has been serving a four-month sentence at the Federal Correctional Institution in Lompoc, California, since July.
While the official release date is slated for September 29, federal guidelines allow inmates to be released earlier if the date falls on a weekend, prompting speculation that CZ may be released on September 27 (today) instead.
Now, the crypto community is abuzz with the impact this early release could have on the market. Binance‚Äôs token (BNB) aside, experts suggest that CZ‚Äôs return, once officially disclosed, could potentially trigger a market rally across the overall digital currency market.
One ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Why Did Dogecoin Rise 10% And The Shiba Inu Price Jumped 22%?
entry.summary:
Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) prices have surged by 10% and 22% in the last 24 hours, respectively. These price surges are thanks to developments on the macro side and these meme coins‚Äô fundamentals, which provide a bullish outlook for them.¬†
Why Dogecoin And Shiba Inu Prices Are Up
Dogecoin and Shiba Inu‚Äôs prices have surged thanks to macro developments like the monetary policies being rolled out by world governments. This has boosted investors‚Äô confidence in allocating more capital to risk assets like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu. Earlier this week, the People‚Äôs Bank of China announced rate cuts and a stimulus package to revive the country‚Äôs economy.¬†
Meanwhile, the latest US jobless claims and GDP data showed that the US economy is healthy. This follows last week‚Äôs 50 basis poi‚Ä¶

entry.title: South Korea Hits Worldcoin With Nearly $1 Million Fine‚ÄìHere‚Äôs What Happened
entry.summary:
South Korea‚Äôs Personal Information Protection Commission (PIPC) has imposed a fine on Tools for Humanity, the developer behind the Worldcoin project, for violating local data privacy laws.
The commission announced that the company was fined over 1.1 billion Korean won (roughly $830,000) for allegedly mishandling personal data and breaching overseas data transfer regulations.
These violations primarily centered around the collection and transfer of sensitive biometric data, particularly iris scans, without proper consent and notification.
More Details On The Matter
The PIPC disclosed in a press release uploaded on September 26 that Worldcoin did not adequately inform users about the purpose of collecting their iris data or the period for which this information would be retained. ‚Ä¶

entry.title: US Platforms Regaining Dominance In Bitcoin Holdings: Is This Bullish?
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the US-based platforms have recently been expanding their Bitcoin holdings. Here‚Äôs what this could mean for BTC‚Äôs price.
Bitcoin US To The Rest Reserve Ratio Has Been On The Rise Recently
As explained by CryptoQuant founder and CEO Ki Young Ju in a new post on X, BTC appears to have been shifting from other countries to American exchanges recently.
The on-chain metric of interest here is the ‚ÄúUS to The Rest Reserve Ratio,‚Äù which keeps track of the ratio between the total amount of Bitcoin that the US-based central entities like exchanges and funds are holding and that the platforms in the rest of the world own.
When the value of this metric goes up, it means the cryptocurrency is moving to US-based platforms from those in the rest of the world. On the other ha‚Ä¶

entry.title: How Jan 6. Organizer Became Meme Coin Kingpin
entry.summary: Dustin Stockton is known as the ‚ÄúGodfather of Political Finance‚Äù but he wasn‚Äôt always known this way. He was originally heavily involved in campaigning for Donald Trump and was the lead organizer of January 6. As the protest came closer, he realized things would go south and backed out. From home, he watched Trump supporters raid the capitol building. He knew his life was never going to be the same.

entry.title: Why CEO Jack Lu Is Pushing Magic Eden Beyond NFTs
entry.summary: Magic Eden's grip on the NFT market has been cemented by a multi-chain approach under co-founder and CEO Jack Lu. Now the marketplace is pushing forward with a digital wallet that bridges Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana as it eyes other future expansions. Lu discusses Magic Eden's evolution since its early days, along with valuable lessons learned in the turbulent crypto industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 198 - THE GREAT APE HEIST!
entry.summary: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won‚Äôt advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 197 - Debate Disaster
entry.summary: Crypto falls slightly after Presidential debate. Exchanges see highest BTC outflow since May. Be wary of Yen move for BTC: Hayes. SOL active addresses hit ATH. At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn‚Äôt go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 196 - THE INFLOWS RETURN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$29m, ETH ETFs: -$5m. BTC rallies, ETF has first inflow in 9 trading days. BTC may have put in first higher low in 6 months. Saylor predicts $13m price for BTC. Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 195 - CAN WE GET A BOUNCE?
entry.summary: BTC: 55.3k (+2%), ETH: 2320 (+1%), SOL: 130 (0%). Top Gainers: FTM, TAO, BTT, AAVE, TON, ATOM. Crypto mini-bounce continues, BTC reclaims $55k. BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU‚Äôs down 95%.

entry.title: Presenting MYRIAD, a prediction market and digital media engagement ecosystem
entry.summary: Media company DASTAN, the parent company of Decrypt and Rug Radio, is embarking on the next stage of its evolution with the launch of MYRIAD, a prediction market and engagement ecosystem that aims to ‚Äútransform the digital media landscape.‚Äù

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 194 - ARE NFTS BACK?
entry.summary: Crypto weak after continued ETF outflows. Durov breaks silence, TON bounces 3%. Telegram will start moderating private chats. Hayes & Brandt flip bearish on BTC. Coinbase shares hit 7 month lows. 90% of crypto firm applications rejected in UK. Japan‚Äôs 3 largest banks to trial stablecoins. Trump promises again to embrace crypto. INJ launches BlackRock BUIDL index. DWF to launch synthetic stablecoin. Vitalik to donate all L2 tokens to charity. Most VCs in crypto ‚Äòwill disappear‚Äô.

entry.title: Crypto Researcher Explains Meme Coin Mania
entry.summary: Head of Research at CoinMarketCap, Alice Liu, breaks down the highs and lows of meme coin mania in 2024. We‚Äôve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we‚Äôve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 193 - NVIDIA DROPS-OFF
entry.summary: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX‚Äôs Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto‚Äôs ‚Äòcorporate phase‚Äô. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 192 - WTF IS ETHERVISTA
entry.summary: OI continues to rise as BTC stabilises. BTC still best performing assets class this year. FTX to distribute $16bn to creditors starting in Q4. Qatar introduces regulatory framework for crypto. ETH L1s fees down 90%, L2 activity ATH. Base hits 14m monthly users, many may be Sybil. ETH is in death spiral: Krueger. SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won‚Äôt help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.

entry.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins
entry.summary: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.
